descriptions.content:
On the people of Sharkhok (shar khog) in the area of Zungchu (zung chu, songpan), see Samten Karmay and Philippe Sagant. Les neuf forces de l’homme: récits des confins du Tibet [The Nine Forces of Man: Stories from the Borders of Tibet]. Nanterre: Société d’ethnologie, 1998.

Amdo polity leaders from list in Ldong ka tshang Dge shis chos grags, Ldong ka tshang Skal bzang sgrol ma, Ldong ka tshang Bsod nams lha mo. Bod kyi gdung rus zhib ’jug. Pe cin: Mi rigs dpe skrun khang, 2001.
